t: History of the Amazon Logo Design Evolution - Famous Logos
s: March 10, 2020 - The story of the rise of the Amazon brand is quite fascinating. A way from a regular online bookstore to one of the world’s biggest online stores, where you can buy absolutely everything, was long and definitely not easy. Founded in 1994, it is still here, and we can’t imagine a life without it. Join us in this article as we take a look at the History of the Amazon Logo ...
